title: Can you still get the project vayne border?
body: Just asking since i'll be getting her in a few Days :)

replies.body: Sadly, no. It's an even only exclusive.
Aww,alrighty,Is it possible to get it next project event at least?
Nope. All borders on skins have been event exclusives, and are limited to the time they are released. So, once the event is gone you can't get em again.
Don't think so. They didn't do it for the previous skins.
